title: Toradex Titan Eval Kit incorporates NXP’s i.MX 95 applications processor
description: Yesterday, Toradex launched an NXP-based embedded platform, designed to excel in real-time processing and machine learning applications while maintaining power efficiency. Key features of this new platform include dual GbE with Time-Sensitive Networking (TSN), a high-speed 10 GbE port, and support for LPDDR5 memory, among others. The System-on-Module integrates the recently launched NXP i.MX 95 […]
